column4: how to update latest software and security for ubuntu feisty fawn?
how to add latest repositories indexes?
either use the System > Administration > Update Manager, or type "apt-get update" in command line
when you use the update manager, the software sources is directly linked to that
on the first tab there should be community repository....(universe)
yup thats the one, is it enabled ?
try changing server and do revert
how did that work for you ?
u get that error when u try to check if any updates are available ??
when do you get that error then ? when your trying to do what ?
open update manager (apt-get update) and see if any updates are available, if not, then your computer is up-to-date
System > Administration > Update Manager, or from the command-line type "apt-get update"
